messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] champagne moment...
messages.msgSnippet: Gosh!  I wonder how you see me, I suppose Daphne from Frasier but fatter with a bigger nose and glasses would work, and  change the accent from Lancs to
messages.messageBody:
Gosh!  I wonder how you see me, I suppose Daphne from Frasier but fatter with a bigger nose and glasses would work, and  change the accent from Lancs to Yorkshire...  I'm in West Yorks, 'Last of the Summer Wine' country if anyone's familiar with it...
 
Tracy
----- Original Message -----
From: HPaulson5@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 04, 2000 1:49 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] champagne moment...

Hi Tracy-- I'm Karen from Ind., and I have some very young kids, too.  I
enjoyed reading your posts, and I was curious as to where you live in the
U.K., if you don't mind sharing.  Your posts catch my attention, as I can
easily visualize you and your family while reading them.  Thanks for sharing
so many happy thoughts!                 Karen

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] champagne moment...
messages.msgSnippet: Karen- Yep, you got it! here I am asking you another question about abb. words:  is LLL Le Leche League? I am very interested in LLL. My dh is not convinced
messages.messageBody:
Karen-
Yep, you got it!
here I am asking you another question about abb. words: is LLL Le Leche
League?
I am very interested in LLL. My dh is not convinced that I should nurse the
next baby...
Stephanie
